DataElement.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite Sexual Medications/Devices Supplement Last 4 Weeks Usual Quality of Erections Without Assistance Score 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of the usual quality of their erections without the assistance of medicines or devices during the last 4 weeks, using a four point Likert Scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite Sexual Medications/Devices Supplement Last 4 Weeks Usual Quality of Erections Without Assistance of Medicines or Devices Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A component of the EPIC designed to assess the use of erectile aids among patients treated for prostate cancer._A question about whether an individual has or had a penile prosthesis._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite, Sexual Medications/Devices Supplement
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A component of the EPIC designed to assess the use of erectile aids among patients treated for prostate cancer.

Concepts.longName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite, Sexual Medications/Devices Supplement
Concepts.definition: A component of the EPIC designed to assess the use of erectile aids among patients treated for prostate cancer.

Property.preferredName: Describe Usual Quality of Erections Without Assistance of Medicines or Devices During Last 4 Weeks Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A question about how an individual would describe the usual quality of their erections without the assistance of medications or devices during the last four weeks.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.longName: Describe Usual Quality of Erections Without Assistance of Medicines or Devices During Last 4 Weeks
Concepts.definition: A question about how an individual would describe the usual quality of their erections without the assistance of medications or devices during the last four weeks.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Erection is the hardening, enlarging and rising of the penis which often occurs in the sexually aroused male.:Quality; a degree or grade of excellence or worth; an essential and distinguishing attribute of something or someone.:A natural number greater than 3 and less than 5 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of three and one.:The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.:an ordered reference standard.

Concepts.definition: The hardening, enlarging and rising of the penis which often occurs in the sexually aroused male.
An essential and distinguishing attribute of something or someone; a degree or grade of excellence or worth.
A natural number greater than 3 and less than 5 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of three and one.
The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.
An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
